description.brazilian: Role a mesma face em dois dados.
description.english: Pay your first debt.
description.french: Obtenir la même face sur deux dés.
description.german: Würfel mit zwei Würfeln dieselbe Augenzahl.
description.russian: Погаси свой первый долг.
description.schinese: 掷出两个顶面相同的骰子。
description.spanish: Paga tu primera deuda.

description.brazilian: Ganhe o Lado 2
description.english: Beat Face 2.
description.french: Battre Face 2.
description.russian: Пройди Грань 2.
description.spanish: Supera la Cara 2.

description.brazilian: Role 4 quatros em uma única rolagem.
description.english: Roll 4 fours in a single roll.
description.french: Obtenir quatre fois le chiffre 4 en un seul lancer.
description.german: Wirf 4 Vieren in einem einzigen Wurf.
description.russian: Выбить 4 четвёрки за один бросок.
description.spanish: Saca 4 cuatros en una tirada.

description.brazilian: Ganhe o Lado 3 usando a Mão Branca.
description.english: Beat Face 3 as White Hand.
description.french: Battre Face 3 avec Main Blanche.
description.russian: Пройди Грань 3 играя за: Белая Рука.
description.spanish: Supera la Cara 3 con la Mano Blanca.

description.brazilian: Ganhe o Lado 1.
description.english: Beat Face 1.
description.french: Battre Face 1.
description.russian: Пройди Грань 1.
description.spanish: Supera la Cara 1.

description.brazilian: Derrote o Chefão Ímpar.
description.english: Beat the Odd boss.
description.french: Battre le Boss Impertinent.
description.russian: Победи Нечёт.
description.spanish: Supera el jefe El Impar.

description.brazilian: Derrote o Chefão Par.
description.english: Beat the Even boss.
description.french: Battre le Boss Pertinent.
description.russian: Победи Чёт.
description.spanish: Supera el jefe El Par.

description.brazilian: Ganhe o Lado 3 com Mão Chiada.
description.english: Beat Face 3 as Static Hand.
description.french: Battre Face 3 avec Main Statique.
description.russian: Пройди Грань 3 играя за: Шумная Рука.
description.spanish: Supera la Cara 3 con la Mano Estática.

description.brazilian: Faça um dado alcançar 1000 de valor adicional.
description.english: Have a die reach 1000 extra value.
description.french: Avoir un dé avec une valeur supplémentaire de 1000.
description.german: Erreiche einen Zusatzwert von 1000 für einen Würfel.
description.russian: Довести дополнительное значение одного кубика до 1000.
description.schinese: 使一枚骰子的附加值达到1000。
description.spanish: Consigue un dado con 1000 de valor extra.

description.brazilian: Dentro de um amendoim.
description.english: Inside a Peanut.
description.french: Se cache dans les cacahuètes.
description.russian: Внутри арахиса...
description.spanish: Dentro de un cacahuete.

description.brazilian: Ganhe um jogo em Elevado a VI com Mão Verde.
description.english: Beat the game in Power VI as Green Hand.
description.french: Gagner une partie en Puissance VI avec Main Verte.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel in Potenz VI als Grüne Hand ab.
description.russian: Пройди игру на VI Возвышении играя за: Зелёная Рука.
description.schinese: 用绿掌在赋能VI难度下通关游戏。
description.spanish: Gana una partida en Potencia VI con la Mano Verde.

description.brazilian: Tenha 9 dados na mesa.
description.english: Have 9 dice on the table.
description.french: Avoir 9 dés sur la table.
description.russian: Иметь 9 кубиков на столе.
description.schinese: 在桌上同时拥有9粒骰子。
description.spanish: Ten 9 dados en el tablero.

description.brazilian: Role 1 em 5 dados ao mesmo tempo.
description.english: Roll a 1 on 5 dice at the same time.
description.french: Obtenir cinq fois le chiffre 1 en un seul lancer.
description.russian: Одновременно выбить 1 на 5 кубиках.
description.schinese: 同时掷出5个顶面为1的骰子。
description.spanish: Saca un 1 en 5 dados al mismo tiempo.

description.brazilian: Consiga pelo menos 1000 pontos em uma única rolagem.
description.english: Get at least 1000 pips in a single roll.
description.french: Obtenir au moins 1000 points en un seul lancer.
description.german: Erhalte mindestens 1000 Pips in einem einzigen Wurf.
description.russian: Набрать как минимум 1000 точек за один бросок.
description.schinese: 在一次掷骰中至少获得1000点数。
description.spanish: Consigue al menos 1000 puntos en una sola tirada.

description.brazilian: Ganhe uma rodada em Elevado a I
description.english: Beat the game in Power I.
description.french: Gagner une partie en Puissance I.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel in Potenz I ab.
description.russian: Пройди игру на I Возвышении.
description.schinese: 在赋能I难度下通关游戏。
description.spanish: Gana una partida en Potencia I.

description.brazilian: Faça com que um único dado seja multiplicado por pelo menos 100.
description.english: Have a single die reach at least 100X Multiplier.
description.french: Obtenir un multiplicateur d’au moins 100 sur un dé.
description.german: Erreiche mit einem einzigen Würfel mindestens einen 100-fachen Multiplikator.
description.russian: Доведи множитель одного кубика как минимум до 100Х.
description.schinese: 使一粒骰子的倍数达到至少100X
description.spanish: Consigue al menos X100 Multiplicador en un solo dado.

description.brazilian: Tenha pelo menos 5 dados raros ou lendários na sua bolsa.
description.english: Have at least 5 rare or legendary dice in your bag.
description.french: Avoir au moins 5 dés rares ou légendaires dans le sac.
description.german: Habe mindestens 5 seltene oder legendäre Würfel in deinem Beutel.
description.russian: Иметь в мешочке не менее 5 редких или легендарных кубиков.
description.schinese: 在骰子袋中拥有至少5粒稀有或传奇骰子。
description.spanish: Ten al menos 5 dados raros o legendarios en tu bolsa.

description.brazilian: Faça um dado chegar a um valor adicional de 10.
description.english: Have a die reach 10 extra value.
description.french: Obtenir un dé avec une valeur supplémentaire de 10.
description.german: Erreiche einen Zusatzwert von 10 für einen Würfel.
description.russian: Доведи дополнительное значение одного кубика до 10.
description.schinese: 使一粒骰子的附加值达到10。
description.spanish: Consigue un dado con 10 de valor extra.

description.brazilian: Remova 10 dados em um único nível.
description.english: Remove 10 dice in a single run.
description.french: Supprimer 10 dés dans une seule partie.
description.german: Entferne 10 Würfel in einem einzigen Zug.
description.russian: Избавься от 10 кубиков за один забег.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏里移除10粒骰子。
description.spanish: Elimina 10 dados en una sola partida.

description.brazilian: Ganhe uma rodada em Elevado a VI com Mão Vermelha.
description.english: Beat the game in Power VI as Red Hand.
description.french: Gagner une partie en Puissance VI avec Main Rouge.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel in Potenz VI als Rote Hand ab.
description.russian: Пройди игру на VI Возвышении играя за: Красная Рука.
description.schinese: 用红掌在赋能VI难度下通关游戏。
description.spanish: Gana una partida en Potencia VI con la Mano Roja.

description.brazilian: Tenha exatos 42 pontos.
description.english: Have exactly 42 pips.
description.french: Avoir précisément 42 points.
description.russian: Набрать ровно 42 точки.
description.spanish: Ten exactamente 42 puntos.

description.brazilian: Alcance um milhão de pontos com Mão Branca.
description.english: Get a million pips as White Hand.
description.french: Obtenir un million de points avec Main Blanche.
description.german: Erhalte eine Million Pips als Weiße Hand.
description.russian: Набрать миллион точек играя за: Белая Рука.
description.schinese: 用白掌获得一百万点点数。
description.spanish: Consigue un millón de puntos con la Mano Blanca.

description.english: Beat Face 3.
description.french: Battre Face 3.
description.russian: Пройди Грань 3.
description.spanish: Supera la Cara 3.

description.brazilian: Tenha pelo menos um milhão de pontos.
description.english: Have at least a million pips.
description.french: Avoir au moins un million de points.
description.russian: Набрать как минимум миллион точек.
description.schinese: 拥有至少一百万点点数
description.spanish: Acumula al menos un millón puntos.

description.german: Erhalte eine Million Pips als Grüne Hand.
description.russian: Набрать миллион точек играя за: Зелёная Рука.
description.schinese: 用绿掌获得一百万点点数。
description.spanish: Consigue un millón de puntos con la Mano Verde.

description.brazilian: Acumule pelo menos 666 milhões de pontos com Mão Verde.
description.english: Have at least 666M pips as Green Hand.
description.french: Avoir au moins 666M de points avec Main Verte.
description.german: Erhalte mindestens 666 Millionen Pips als Grüne Hand.
description.russian: Набрать 666 миллионов точек играя за: Зелёная Рука.
description.schinese: 用绿掌拥有至少666百万点点数。
description.spanish: Acumula al menos 666M de puntos con la Mano Verde.

description.brazilian: Passe uma rodada sem rolar dados.
description.english: Pass a round without ever rolling any die.
description.french: Passer une manche sans jamais lancer de dé.
description.german: Schließe eine Runde ab, ohne jemals einen Würfel zu werfen.
description.russian: Пройди раунд, не бросив ни одного кубика.
description.schinese: 在不掷出任何骰子的情况下通过一轮游戏。
description.spanish: Supera una ronda sin lanzar un solo dado.

description.brazilian: Pegue 20 dados em um turno.
description.english: Draw 20 dice in one turn.
description.french: Lancer 20 dés en un seul tour.
description.russian: Вытяни из мешочка 20 кубиков за один ход.
description.schinese: 在一回合内抽取20粒骰子。
description.spanish: Roba 20 dados en un turno.

description.brazilian: Ganhe uma promoção com Mão Branca.
description.english: Get promoted as White Hand.
description.french: Obtenir une promotion avec Main Blanche.
description.russian: Получи повышение играя за: Белая Рука.
description.spanish: Consigue un ascenso con la Mano Blanca.

description.english: Get promoted as Red Hand.

description.brazilian: Obtenha a menor Boneca Matriosca.

description.spanish: Consigue la Matrioshka más pequeña.

description.spanish: Usa una carta de Cambio para cambiar tu mano.

description.brazilian: Chegue até a saída
description.english: Get to the exit
description.french: Allez jusqu'a la sortie
description.russian: Доберись до выхода
description.spanish: Llega a la salida

description.brazilian: Chegue ao Vórtice 4
description.english: Reach Vortex 4
description.french: Atteignez le niveau 4 du Vortex.

description.spanish: Alcanza el Vórtice 4

description.english: Reach Vortex 7

description.spanish: Alcanza el Vórtice 7

description.english: Reach Vortex 10

description.spanish: Alcanza el Vórtice 10

description.brazilian: Ganhe um jogo com Elevado VI com Mão Pálida
description.english: Beat the game in Power VI as Pale Hand.
description.french: Gagner une partie en Puissance VI avec Main Pâle.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel in Potenz VI als Blasse Hand ab.
description.russian: Пройди игру на VI Возвышении играя за: Бледная Рука.
description.schinese: 用苍白掌在赋能VI难度下通关游戏。
description.spanish: Gana una partida en Potencia VI con la Mano Pálida.

description.brazilian: Role pelo menos 8 dados em uma única rolagem.
description.english: Roll at least 8 dice in a single roll.
description.french: Lancer au moins 8 dés en un seul lancer.
description.german: Wirf mindestens 8 Würfel in einem einzigen Wurf.
description.russian: Брось как минимум 8 кубиков за один раз.
description.schinese: 单次掷骰掷出至少8粒骰子。
description.spanish: Lanza al menos 8 dados en una sola tirada

description.brazilian: Reconstrua um dado estranho
description.english: Rebuild a strange die
description.french: Reconstituez un étrange dé.
description.russian: Восстанови странный кубик
description.spanish: Reconstruye un dado extraño

description.brazilian: Complete o desafio
description.english: Complete the challenge
description.french: Terminez le défi.
description.russian: Пройди испытание
description.spanish: Completa el desafío

description.brazilian: Role uma moeda de 2 lados pelo menos 10 vezes.
description.english: Roll 2-faced coin at least 10 times.
description.french: Lancer la Pièce à deux faces au moins 10 fois.
description.russian: Брось двухгранную монету как минимум 10 раз.
description.spanish: Lanza la Moneda de 2 caras al menos 10 veces

description.brazilian: Tenha um D7, D8 e D10 em sua bolsa.
description.english: Have a D7, D8 and D10 in your bag.
description.french: Avoir un D7, un D8 et un D10 dans votre sac.
description.german: Habe einen D7, D8 und D10 in deinem Beutel.
description.russian: Иметь в мешке D7, D8 и D10.
description.schinese: 在骰子袋中同时拥有D7，D8和D10。
description.spanish: Ten un D7, D8 y D10 en tu bolsa

description.brazilian: Quebre sua casca.
description.english: Break its shell.
description.french: Briser sa coquille.
description.russian: Разбей его оболочку.
description.spanish: Rompe su coraza.

description.brazilian: Derrote o Chefão Bruxa.
description.english: Beat The Witch boss.
description.french: Battre le Boss Sorcière.
description.russian: Победи Ведьму.
description.spanish: Supera el jefe La Bruja.

description.brazilian: Derrote o Chefão Cauteloso.
description.english: Beat The Cautious boss.
description.french: Battre le Boss Prudent.
description.russian: Победи Бдительного.
description.spanish: Supera el jefe El Cuidadoso.

description.brazilian: Derrote o Chefão Imitador.
description.english: Beat The Copycat boss.
description.french: Battre le Boss Copie-chat.
description.russian: Победи Повторюшкота.
description.spanish: Supera el jefe El Copión.

description.brazilian: Crie um paradoxo

description.french: Engendrez un paradoxe.
description.russian: Создай парадокс
description.spanish: Crea una paradoja

description.english: Get the first piece

description.brazilian: Obtenha a segunda peça
description.english: Get the second piece

description.english: Beat a Boss round.
description.french: Battre une manche de Boss.
description.russian: Пройди раунд с Боссом.

description.brazilian: Lembrar alguém de algo.
description.english: Remind someone of something.
description.french: Rappeler quelque chose à quelqu'un.
description.russian: Напомнить кое-кому о кое-чём.
description.spanish: Recuerda a alguien de algo.
